name: Beat Saber for Quest Mod
summary: A QMOD file is a mod for the Oculus Quest version of Beat Saber, a virtual reality (VR) rhythm game in which players slice blocks in time to music. It contains a custom item or user interface element that can be added to the game. Players install QMOD files using BMBF, a modding application.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
